title: Mahama Meets Queens
text:
16:37 CET Mahama Meets Queens By Daily Guide 
Ghana's female national team the Black Queens will finally get an opportunity to meet the President of the Republic of Ghana John Dramani Mahama this Sunday October 15. 
The Queens exceeded expectations and brought pride and honor to the nation following their gold winning feat at the just ended All Africa Games held in Congo Brazzaville. 
Issues of winning bonuses marred a rather historic moment as the triumph was the first time the Queens had won any trophy for the nation. 
But come Sunday, the President of the Republic, who was in the U.S when the team arrived from Congo, will host the ladies at the seat of Presidency. 
President Mahama is expected to use the occasion to discuss issues of the team's unpaid bonuses and restructure remuneration packages for the various national teams. Sports News Follow Us "No one gets into a fight to loose, but the real loosers are those who quit trying to win." By: Francis Aka-eri
